column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////On my first trip to Chicago
column2: it was go deep dish or go home. After some research
column3: I decided to walk the scenic mile to Lou Malnati's and get a deep dish to-go. Though I plan to try other spots when/if I come back to Chicago
column4: I can't imagine it getting any better than this. Outside of thin crust in New York
column5: this is one of the best pizzas I've ever had the delight of eating. Leftovers for lunch tomorrow? Just couldn't do it.
